meanings.definition: Having little width in proportion to height or length.
meanings.sent1: She chose the slimmest dress in the store for the party.
meanings.sent2: The model showed off her slimmest figure on the runway.
meanings.sent3: The slimmest cat in the neighborhood always manages to squeeze through the fence.
meanings.sent4: The slimmest chance of winning the lottery didn't deter him from buying a ticket.
meanings.sent5: The slimmest thread held the kite in the sky.
